data.message: Dude you have to understand I have been listening to you since I was 12-13...I remember being in middle school and everyone talking about you...when your slim shady lp dropped...I remember making my parents buy your Marshall mathers lp when it came out in 2000...I think we bought like 2-3 copies, I made my mom buy me one and my dad buy me one yes of the same album because I couldn't buy it myself because of the parental advisory sticker(the 3rd copy I actually found it and it was given to me)...I still am in love with that album...and you have to understand the influence you had on me and people of my generation...I still listen to that album this day..
